sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: In Portal, the Change password process helps users to change their current password, you can customize this process to add more handling when user change password.

sect2.title: Customization
sect2.para: Create a callable sub process in your project with the changePassword(String,String) signature. It must return an enums ChangePasswordStatus and the message showing to user (you can override this process in PortalKit):
